description:
"os-start/os-stop" server action does not work for V2.1 API.

Those needs to be converted to V2.1 from V3 base code.

This needs to be fixed to make V2.1 backward compatible with V2 APIs
title: 'os-start/os-stop' server actions does not work for v2.1 API

comments.content:
Below server action needs does not work for V2.1 API.
1. start server
2. stop server
3. confirm resize
4. revert resize

Those needs to be converted to V2.1 from V3 base code.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ghanshyammann

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/120328
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/120328
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=a5c9340130f86d1f2a54a808add32d9d7d7355cd
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit a5c9340130f86d1f2a54a808add32d9d7d7355cd
Author: Ghanshyam <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Sep 10 16:24:23 2014 +0900

    Fix 'os-start/os-stop' server actions for V2.1 API
    
    'os-start/os-stop' server actions were missed for V2.1 API.
    This patch converts 'os-start/os-stop' server action for V2.1 API
    
    The differences between v2 and v3 are described on the wiki page
    https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/NovaAPIv2tov3.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1367575
    
    Change-Id: I8b0f27fb639034d368bcc1fc51d20daf9c2cdeb5
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
